name: df-lly
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0
body: |- wceq(clly(c0), crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cin(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(co(cv(s0), crest, cv(s3)), c0)))))))
comment: Define a space that is locally ` A ` , where ` A ` is a topological property like "compact", "connected", or "path-connected". A topological space is locally ` A ` if every neighborhood of a point contains an open sub-neighborhood that is ` A ` in the subspace topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
